replies.msg:
最近見多咗人話戴豬咀, 見屋企口罩存量越來越少, 自己都想入番個豬咀, 留番啲口罩俾老豆媽子用

上amazon睇, 見到有啲豬咀配眼罩一set過, 唔知有冇巴絲打有入貨:

(1) Vktech Industrial Gas Chemical Anti-Dust Respirator Mask Goggles Set

https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00B1YP7U2/ref=ox_sc_act_title_1?smid=A343L3F8RZU994&psc=1

(2) Holulo Chemical Anti-Dust Respirator Mask w/Goggles Set Gas Mask

https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B06XGYSMH4/ref=ox_sc_act_image_2?smid=A27H153XYWTSLJ&psc=1

(3) 3M Full Facepiece Reusable Respirator 6800

https://www.amazon.com/3M-Facepiece-Respirator-6800-Chemicals/dp/B007JZ1LG6/ref=sr_1_29?keywords=Gas%2BMask%2Bwith%2BSafety%2BGlasses&qid=1580925585&sr=8-29&th=1

見價錢差咁遠, 就做下research, 見到有個網列咗8款2020最好嘅gas mask, 呢3款都榜上有名
https://brainandmouth.com/gas-mask/

第1同第2款價錢明顯平一截, 於是我再睇下amazon d comments, 有唔少人要求退貨, 話似裝飾多過似gas mask

而第3嗰款 (3M) 就係3款中最多正評嘅, 不過有comment話呢個set本身唔包filter, 要另外買 (不過3M 6800嘅filter應該唔算太難入手?)

打算買眼罩同豬咀嘅各位巴絲, 會唔會考慮下一set過買? 大家集思廣益下?

好少出po, 有錯嘅唔好屌太大力
唔錯
P
想join買6800 mask
P牌無得推
